argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prodfmul.1 | |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) |
| 2 |  | prodfmul.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | prodfmul.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | prodfmul.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) x. ( G ` k ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x x. y ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mulcom | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x x. y ) = ( y x. x ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) ) -> ( x x. y ) = ( y x. x ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_mulass | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) -> ( ( x x. y ) x. z ) = ( x x. ( y x. z ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC /\ z e. CC ) ) -> ( ( x x. y ) x. z ) = ( x x. ( y x. z ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 8, 10, 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_seqcaopr | |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( x. , H ) ` N ) = ( ( seq M ( x. , F ) ` N ) x. ( seq M ( x. , G ) ` N ) ) ) |
